faqs.question: What are the best betting sites in Ireland?
faqs.answer_guidance: List top Irish betting sites including Casinia, BoyleSports, Paddy Power, Bet365. Explain what makes each strong. Mention Casinia's crypto and platform advantages.

faqs.question: Which Irish betting sites are the most reliable?
faqs.answer_guidance: Discuss licensing (UKGC vs offshore), payment reliability, customer service quality. Position Casinia's Anjouan license transparently.

faqs.question: Is Casinia a licensed betting company in Ireland?
faqs.answer_guidance: Explain Anjouan license (ALSI-202411077-FI2), what it means for Irish players, player protections. Note Ireland's GRAI regulation launching 2025-2026.

faqs.question: Is Casinia one of the best online bookies?
faqs.answer_guidance: Balanced assessment - platform quality, crypto support, fixture volume vs license and brand recognition concerns.

faqs.question: Does Casinia accept cryptocurrency payments?
faqs.answer_guidance: Yes - USDT support, benefits for Irish bettors, transaction speed, privacy advantages.

faqs.question: How does Casinia compare to BoyleSports?
faqs.answer_guidance: BoyleSports = established Irish brand with UKGC license. Casinia = international platform with crypto, more fixtures, Altenar tech.

faqs.question: What sports can I bet on at Casinia?
faqs.answer_guidance: 40+ sports, 35,000+ fixtures, football (250+ markets), GAA, horse racing, rugby, tennis, UFC, esports, virtual sports.

faqs.question: Is the Casinia mobile app available in Ireland?
faqs.answer_guidance: Yes - dedicated mobile app, iOS/Android, download process, key features available on mobile.
